author: sharpBettingApps
content: If you are interested in this sort of thing; particularly with smaller "local" books run by a group of people (ex. you have accounts, know someone who can get accounts, part of a group etc) then PM me.If the sites have a live framework that is even better.I do this already with several groups and we partner on the overall profit (I share in any losses from bets my apps / algos place). A lot of these group-run books use crypto so happy to pay/get paid that way.
